name: Void Scavengers
description:
A short piece of interactive fiction about refugees scavenging and trying to survive in The Void, the place between the worlds.

This project was written as an assignment for university in 2017. I have uploaded it here as is, completely unchanged from when it was submitted.

-

Written by Hamish McIntyre.

-

If you enjoy this project, please consider buying me a coffee!
